full_summary:
### Senior Satcom Specialists Wanted 

#### Tender Reference Number: PW-23-01023374
#### Amendment Number: 1
#### Solicitation Number: W6369-23P5OX
#### Publication Date: January 26, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: February 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET


The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the provision of two Senior Satcom Specialists. The contract is valued at approximately CAD 1,074,662.40.

**Scope of Work**

The selected vendors will provide the following services:

* Level 3 Telecommunication System Specialist
* Level 3 System Analyst

The scope of work includes an estimated 240 days of effort per resource per year for a duration of approximately three (3) years, with an option to extend for up to two (2) additional one-year periods.

**Security Requirements**

The vendors are required to meet the following security requirements:

* Facility Security Clearance (FSC) for the company
* SECRET clearance for each resource

The selected vendors will be responsible for delivering the services by February 27, 2026.

**Procurement Information**

* **Procurement Category**: Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others

**Eligibility**

The bid is open to all qualified vendors who can meet the security requirements and have the necessary expertise to deliver the services.

**Contact Information**

For any questions or clarifications, please contact Bakhti, Issam at:

issam.bakhti@forces.gc.ca
343-548-0288

The bid documents can be accessed at [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).


Please note that this is an excerpt from [tender number] (PW-23-01023374). The original document provides more detailed information, and it is recommended that interested vendors carefully review the entire document before submitting their proposals.
